query.sql: SELECT concat(concat(teacher_code,'-'),teacher_name) teacher_name, class_name , concat(concat(branch_code,'-'),branch_name) branch_name, course_id, t.last_update_by, DATE_FORMAT(t.create_date,'%Y-%m-%d') create_date, DATE_FORMAT(t.last_update_date,'%Y-%m-%d') last_update_date, (select CONCAT(CONCAT(user_code,'-'),user_name) from sys_user where user_id =t.last_update_by) last_update_user FROM fnd_course t,fnd_class c,fnd_branch b,fnd_teacher te where t.class_id = c.class_id and t.branch_id = b.branch_id and t.teacher_id = te.teacher_id and c.enable_flag='Y' and b.enable_flag='Y' and t.enable_flag='Y' #AND_CLAUSE# order by c.class_code, t.create_date desc
